titleStmt.title: The braineles blessing of the bull the hornes, the heads and all, light on their squint eyed skonses full that boweth their knees to ball.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at S. Katherins beside the Tower of London, ouer against the Beare daunce, by Alexander Lacie,

notesStmt.note: Of 27 April 1570, Regnans in excelsis. Cf. STC.
Verse: "The cancred curse that wolde consume this realme with wracke and ruine ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: S. Katherins beside the Tower of London, ouer against the Beare daunce
